parameters.name: handleErrors
parameters.label: Evaluate all states as errors (except for 2xx and 3xx )

expect.name: shareCookies
expect.label: Share cookies with other HTTP modules

expect.name: rejectUnauthorized
expect.label: Reject connections that are using unverified (self-signed) certificates

expect.name: useQuerystring
expect.label: Disable serialization of multiple same query string keys as arrays

mapper.html:
Hi {{2.firstname}}! Thank you. Your order has been received successfully.

Here are your order details:

  • Order ID: {{2.order_id}}
  • Product:{{28.product_name}}
  • Quantity:{{28.item_qty}}
  • Total:{{28.line_total}}

Your items will be delivered to {{2.selected_store.label}} {{2.selected_store.landmark}}. You may contact the pick up store at {{2.selected_store.contact}}.

Thank you.
Regards,
Chess Team
mapper.subject: Your Chess Order

mapper.html:
Hi Rabi, you have received a new order. Find further details below.

Personal Details

  • First Name: {{2.firstname}}
  • Last Name: {{2.lastname}}
  • Address: {{2.address1}}
  • Other Address: {{2.address2}}
  • City: {{2.city}}
  • Zipcode: {{2.zipcode}}
  • Phone: {{2.phone}}
  • State Name: {{2.state_name}}
  • Country: {{2.country}}

Selected Store Details

  • Phone: {{2.selected_store.contact}}
  • GPS: {{2.selected_store.gpsname}}
  • Label: {{2.selected_store.label}}
  • Landmark: {{2.selected_store.landmark}}

Order Details:

  • Order ID:{{2.order_id}}
  • Product: {{29.product_name}}
  • Quantity: {{29.item_qty}}
  • Total: {{29.line_total}}
Regards,
Chess Team
mapper.subject: Chess New Order
